name: Switcher
body:
Switcher
========

Switcher. Switch your hosts gracefully. Based on node-webkit.

### Downloads

* MacOSX v1.0.1 [百度云盘](http://pan.baidu.com/s/1i3A2JHV) [Dropbox](https://www.dropbox.com/s/hslibjfrfs9vqv5/Switcher.1.0.1.zip)
